text:
Each time I call, I go through all the menus, enter my personal info, and then get the message that they're experiencing a high call volume and to call back later.

Does anyone know of any tips to get through?


EDIT: I called again this morning at exactly 8am and after being on hold for 45 minutes I got through.
title: Trying to file for unemployment and I need to call the Telephone Claims Center and speak with a claims specialist to complete my claim. I've been trying all day and can't get through.
